thread.title: Kelly Ripa Jokes Mark Consuelos Is Overcompensating After Her 'Mean After Sex' Comments
thread.title_full: Kelly Ripa Jokes Mark Consuelos Is Overcompensating After Her 'Mean After Sex' Comments

title: Kelly Ripa Jokes Mark Consuelos Is Overcompensating After Her 'Mean After Sex' Comments
text:
Kelly Ripa Jokes Mark Consuelos Is Overcompensating After Her 'Mean After Sex' Comments February 22, 2017 @ 1:07 PM By Nicholas Hautman 
Setting the record straight! Kelly Ripa is backtracking the much-publicized comments she made last week about how her husband, Mark Consuelos , is "immediately mean" to her after sex — or as she called it, "special grownup time." 
"I'm sorry! I was joking," the talk show host, 46, clarified on Live with Kelly on Wednesday, February 22, as seen in the video above. "This is a funny, irreverent show. I didn't realize that it would become trending news." Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos on 'Live with Kelly.' Celebrity Sex Confessions 
Luckily, Consuelos, 45, told viewers he wasn't bothered by his wife of 20 years' joke. "I laughed," he said while cohosting the syndicated morning show on Wednesday. "I didn't refute it because I thought it was the most ridiculous thing I ever heard. … I just wanted to set the record straight that no one can be mean after something if they are unconscious. I sleep." Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos in New York City on October 22, 2015. Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images 
"Maybe that's what I meant," Ripa replied. "I didn't really mean 'mean.' I meant completely disinterested, like sound asleep."
